author: Special Correspondent
text:
The MSME Development Institute, Coimbatore, will conduct an industrial motivation campaign to select candidates for a two-week entrepreneurship development training programme for the benefit of SC candidates on January 4.

The training will be organised under the Prime Minister’s ‘Make in India’ project and will commence at the Jenney’s Educational and Charitable Trust, V. V. Shopping Complex, Fairlands.

The candidates in the age group of 18-45 years and those having definite proposal for launching small and micro industries are eligible.

For details, contact A. Shivakumar, Assistant Director of MSME Development Institute, at 94432–07802, 96988-39000, according to a release.
title: Industrial motivation campaign
